creator: fanningpj@yahoo.com
text:
Created attachment 34375
[PATCH] dispose temp file in test code

A small issue in TestSXSSFWorkbookWithCustomZipEntrySource. As the inner classes in the test could be used as the basis of writing a custom version of SXSSFWorkbook, it would be nice to ensure that those classes close all the temp resources they create.

creator: dominik.stadler@gmx.at
text: Thanks for the patch, we already fixed this via r1765019, albeit in a different way, maybe you can take a look if our approach is valid as well.
Oh wait, I will take another look, maybe this is something else.
creator: dominik.stadler@gmx.at
dominik.stadler@gmx.at
text: Thanks, I have applied this via r1765100, although the file was cleaned up by the TempFile implementation automatically as well and thus no file was left over, but it is a bit cleaner this way.
